itunes:title: Episode 299.5 - Too Buzzed To Air - Special Guest Nitro Circus
title: Episode 299.5 - Too Buzzed To Air - Special Guest Nitro Circus
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Nitro Circus over a thousand drinks and dupe Ross into trying to do the 70 Push-up Challenge.  This episode was supposed to air a couple weeks ago, but one of our guest got too drunk and got a little too loo...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Nitro Circus over a thousand drinks and dupe Ross into trying to do the 70 Push-up Challenge.  This episode was supposed to air a couple weeks ago, but one of our guest got too drunk and got a little too loose with his lips about details of an ex-girlfriend, so we had to re-edit it.  Whoops.

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"
